title: Good job doing sound effects for champion skills
body:
Hi, just wanted to write that whoever is working on sound effects for champion skills is doing a great job.

Its a big deal for me when every skill or spell in game have a unique and clear sound effect since I rely on my ears a lot when Im playing and so far sound effects team was working very well on them.

I felt like I have to say its one of very few things left which are still good in LoL so I wanted to say thanks for it.

PS. voice acting on most recent champions is pretty bad though but I believe there are different people responsible for it coming through.

replies.body:
> PS. voice acting on most recent champions is pretty bad though but I believe there are different people responsible for it coming through.

MASSIVE DISAGREEMENT HERE

"First we fight, then we eat!"
"Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"
"Thank you for your contribution."
"C'moooooon... what's the worst that could happen?"
"Those who follow me follow destiny!"

And of course...

"DEMAGLIOOOOO!"

> Those are kind words; the audio team thanks you. =)

Hey, no problem! Just was thinking about the things I still like in LoL and that one was the first in my mind.

> > PS. voice acting on most recent champions is pretty bad though but I believe there are different people responsible for it coming through.
> 
> MASSIVE DISAGREEMENT HERE
> 
> "First we fight, then we eat!"
> "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"
> "Thank you for your contribution."
> "C'moooooon... what's the worst that could happen?"
> "Those who follow me follow destiny!"
> 
> And of course...
> 
> "DEMAGLIOOOOO!"

dont remember who is the first quote from

Yasuo's voice over is wonderful, I agree. I couldnt stop spamming his emotes to entertain myself for the first few games when I played him, I believe that'd lose me my lane few times!

Vel'Koz's voice over is decent too

I dislike Jinx's voice over in part where she mumbles her quotes under the nose. Her voice tone is good enough for a psycho, but the loudness of her voice most of the time is like she's afraid someone will hear her, lol

> dont remember who is the first quote from

Braum!

"Even heaviest door can be opened!"
"Today, we fight each other. Tomorrow, we may fight together!"
"Mother always said: don't lose!"
"Sometimes icy heart just needs warm smile!"

> I dislike Jinx's voice over in part where she mumbles her quotes under the nose. Her voice tone is good enough for a psycho, but the loudness of her voice most of the time is like she's afraid someone will hear her, lol

I think it does a good job of representing the fact that she's 1) utterly manic and 2) a complete sociopath. She doesn't care about other people. Half the stuff she says is just talking to herself.

"What if I had a gun that... *shot other guns???*"
"She's such a lo-ser, always ready to cry! Ta-ta-ta-TA!"

And a lot of what she says is a stage whisper (a fake-whisper, loud enough that everyone around can hear) because the joke is she isn't really hiding it from anyone. There's no reason for her to actually whisper, she's just doing it because she's nucking futs.

"I really need a new gun... (But don't tell my other guns.)"
"I'm wearing lots 'o' belts! (For no reason at all.)"

At the very least, the lines she says when you play against her are distinct enough that you can tell without looking that it's Jinx performing the action. "Bye-bye!" Time to dodge. Frantically. Hopefully in the right direction.
Those are kind words; the audio team thanks you. =)
The sound effects are amazing as is the voice work imo.

> The sound effects are amazing as is the voice work imo.

I dont like that most recent champions and reworks yell so much or just say some random stuff every time they use some skill, I find it very annoying

Also some champs like Quinn, new Sion, Lucian, Jinx have barely audible voice overs. As a non-english speaker I'll never even know what are they saying most of the time if I wont check their voice over phrases on lolwiki.
This is great feedback, thanks for taking the time to share it with us Alexander!  If there are any other examples of issues you have with the VO, please let us know!

> Those are kind words; the audio team thanks you. =)

Hey, no problem! Just was thinking about the things I still like in LoL and that one was the first in my mind.

> > PS. voice acting on most recent champions is pretty bad though but I believe there are different people responsible for it coming through.
> 
> MASSIVE DISAGREEMENT HERE
> 
> "First we fight, then we eat!"
> "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"
> "Thank you for your contribution."
> "C'moooooon... what's the worst that could happen?"
> "Those who follow me follow destiny!"
> 
> And of course...
> 
> "DEMAGLIOOOOO!"

dont remember who is the first quote from

Yasuo's voice over is wonderful, I agree. I couldnt stop spamming his emotes to entertain myself for the first few games when I played him, I believe that'd lose me my lane few times!

Vel'Koz's voice over is decent too

I dislike Jinx's voice over in part where she mumbles her quotes under the nose. Her voice tone is good enough for a psycho, but the loudness of her voice most of the time is like she's afraid someone will hear her, lol

What I was generally speaking is that

> I dont like that most recent champions and reworks yell so much or just say some random stuff every time they use some skill, I find it very annoying
> 
> Also some champs like Quinn, new Sion, Lucian, Jinx have barely audible voice overs. As a non-english speaker I'll never even know what are they saying most of the time if I wont check their voice over phrases on lolwiki.

I turned down the music so I could hear the sound effects better.

Then I got all nostalgic when I heard the music when I watched my brother play.
